name: Dungeon Warriors
description:
3D idle RPG game, players will embark on snowy mountains, ancient castles, grasslands, to explore the ancient mysterious treasures. You can easily hang up and enjoy it, but also through the manual release of skills to feel the excitement of the boss battle.
【RPG Game】
The game incorporates RPG elements, with a skill system, achievement system and a very rich equipment system, allowing players to experience diverse role-playing fun.
【Easy to get started, simple to operate】
The game is easy to use and easy to learn, so even cute girls can play it quickly.
【Placement gameplay】
When the player exits the game, the knight will continue the adventure in the background, helping the player to accumulate experience and gold, and when the player enters the game, he can sit back and continue the adventure at any time.
【Skill System】
Players will unlock several skills in the game, each skill can be set with different runes to obtain various special effects
【Equipment System】
Equipment is divided into weapons, armor and accessories. By spending gold, you can improve your equipment attributes to make you more powerful!
Equipment attributes are randomly generated, so the adventure is full of surprises at any time!
【Pet System】
In the game you can get different shapes and attributes of pets, accompanied by the player in the leisure of the road is no longer lonely.
【Promotion System】
You can upgrade your attributes by way of promotion. The promotion function of the game will be opened automatically when specific requirements are completed. After promotion, players can get rewards and keep their current level, skills, attributes, pets, etc., so that they can become more powerful and break through the more horrible abyss!
